name: formalizes
value: formalizes the mathematical expression of the Trilateral Coherence Axiom
description: The Trilateral Coherence Axiom resource formalizes the representation of an observed object as a tuple (X, D, r) where X is the object with its intrinsic structure, D is the set of applicable dynamics, and r is the observer frame, with the constraint that the prime structure remains invariant across frame transformations
